description: This Kotlin source file defines a utility object SplitUtils for splitting a string into tokens separated by spaces and storing the tokens in a linked list.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing string splitting utility functions.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the input string into tokens separated by spaces and returns a linked list of tokens.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it is valid (not empty).

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is valid (not empty).
